snippet: Of the 144 detainees transferred under the Obama administration, seven are known to have engaged in militant acts, the report said.
abstract: Intelligence analysts release data on former detainee from Guantanamo Bay military prison who they believe has since engaged in terrorist activity and report seven more have been added to list of those suspected of post-release militancy; former detainees were moved under Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: Of the 144 detainees transferred under the Obama administration, seven are known to have engaged in militant acts, the report said.

headline.main: Several More Ex-Guantánamo Detainees Suspected of Militancy, Report Says
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Washington; More Ex-Detainees Suspected of Post-Release Militancy
